author: oheger
msg: Updates to the user's guide related to thread-safety.

author: oheger
msg: Added a test case for concurrent access to CombinedConfiguration without a Synchronizer.

author: oheger
msg: Added a test case for concurrent access to SubnodeConfigurations without a Synchronizer.

author: oheger
msg: BaseHierarchicalConfiguration now implements the Initializable interface.
In initialize() internal data structures for managing SubnodeConfigurations are
initialized. So this initialization does not have to be performed lazily,
which makes concurrent access to SubnodeConfigurations possible without
having to use a fully functional Synchronizer.

author: oheger
msg: BasicConfigurationBuilder now supports the Initializable interface.
If a newly created result instance implements this interface, the initialize()
method is called after other initializations are done.
